name: Summoning Crystal
description: A crystal imbued with mystical power. Used for teleportation magic

name: Spellbook: Summon Friend
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Friend. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\\nRequired level: 56\0

name: Spellbook: Word of Invitation
description: Spellbook needed to learn Word of Invitation. Used by Sorcerers, Spellsingers and Spellhowlers

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Modern Language Version)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. The book was re-published after being translated into the modern language. (Can only be used by characters level 52 or higher.)\0

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Language Version)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book was published by ancient scholars for research purposes. It contains more information than the modern language version. (Can only be used by characters level 61 or higher.)\0

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Manuscript)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book is a hand-written copy of the original. It is almost the same as the original version. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)\0

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Version)
description: Awakens a forgotten ability. Those who lack the requisite knowledge cannot understand its contents. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)\0

name: Elixir of Life (No Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Life (D-Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Life (C-Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Life (B-Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 52 and 60. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Life (A-Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 61 and 75. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Life (S-Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)
description: Regenerates MP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Mental Strength (D-Grade)
description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 20 and below level 39 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Mental Strength (C-Grade)
description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 40 and below level 51 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Mental Strength (B-Grade)
description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 52 and below level 60 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes

description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 61 and below level 75 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes

name: Elixir of Mental Strength (S-Grade)
description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 76 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes

name: Elixir of CP (No Grade)
description: Regenerates CP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of CP (D-Grade)
description: Regenerates CP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of CP (C-Grade)
description: Regenerates CP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Elixir of CP (S-Grade)
description: Regenerates CP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. Re-use delay is 5 minutes

name: Mysterious Solvent
description: Dilutes any substance it is mixed with. Used when creating an elixir

name: Coffer of Shadows
description: A mystical object that has a tiny bit of unstable dark energy trapped inside. Double-click to transform into a random special item

name: Demon Horns
description: A hair accessory for the 2006 Halloween Event

name: Mask of Spirits
description: A hair accessory for the 2006 Halloween Event

name: Fairy Antennae (Event)
description: Cute antennae hair accessory with stars. This is an event item which cannot be exchanged or dropped

description: Bestows one of the following functions: Health, Haste, or Focus

description: This demonic twin blade was forged by Gran Kain, the god of chaos. It needs the fresh blood of a PK at least every 24 hours or it will disappear
